name: Breakout (itch) (Brandt.Donaldson)
description: Breakout is another Unity built outline like the Roll A Ball. The objective of the game is to use your ball and break all of the green bricks. You are given three lives to complete the objective. If you die all three times then it's game over and the game resets. To launch your ball you left click on your mouse. After you launch your ball you need to use the purple brick at the bottom to bounce the ball back towards the green bricks. To move the purple brick you use the A and D keys. Or the left and right  keys on the right side of your keyboard.
